medical_history.chief_complaint: Sudden onset of abdominal pain in the epigastrium radiating to the right scapula.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient awoke at midnight yesterday with sudden onset of abdominal pain, which has persisted without relief. This is in the context of a history of intermittent abdominal pain after eating fatty meals. She also experienced some nausea and vomiting.
